title: The Imposter
description:
Today on True Story-- the return of True Crime! Tig and Cheryl delve into the gritty (just like Tig likes 'em) story of The Imposter-- a French guy who impersonates a Texas teen. Cheryl shares a garage sale story that has both of our hosts laughing hysterically, and Tig makes plans to impersonate Cheryl at her next family reunion. Plus, as always, we get to hear who was attractive/what made them cry! *this episode contains spoilers* (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
